document_data.title: The Truth of Hearts
document_data.author: [[Greg Marks]]
document_data.mainbody: '''The Truth of Hearts''' is an adventure module from the RPGA [[Legacy of the Green Regent]] campaign. It is the first of a four-module series called the Tides of War.
document_data.Plot: A spy who had been collecting information on the defences of [[Loudwater]] for the last two years has left town. He needs to be captured before he can inform the city's enemies.
